resources.string: You’ll have the best seats in the house to watch this internationally-acclaimed fireworks festival.
Watch from the edge of your seat as they compete for the coveted Best Chef honours for the day.
Nowadays, most cruise ships have a swimming pool where you can splash around in the open air. They tend to be busy during summer, but it’s worth taking a dip.
Behold a jaw-dropping natural wonder and the largest calving glacier in North America.
Venture to this scenic destination rumored to have the best whale watching in the state!
With its rugged mountains, sweeping glaciers and lush rainforests, Juneau is a scenic wonderland everywhere you look.

Begin and end your cruise in beautiful Vancouver. Gaze upon natural wonders and sweeping vistas from the comfort of your Disney cruise ship, as you gently glide through the Tracy Arm fjord. Step into Alaska’s backcountry with a visit to Ketchikan, where you can stroll through authentic totem pole parks. Then spend an invigorating day at sea before returning to the largest city in British Columbia and the hustle of everyday life.
Vancouver (British Columbia), Canada, Tracy Arm, Alaska, Ketchikan, Alaska
Vancouver (British Columbia), Canada, Hubbard Glacier, Sitka
